Summary: Disc streaking horizontally across sky from E to NW.
divs: sighting detailsi am a mufon member and my friend, (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms), is visiting me from reno. tonight we were outside enjoying the warm weather - i was looking west, trying to focus my binoculars on a jet heading north. (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)was looking east and saw the following: at first i thought it was a star because it was stationary for about 20 seconds. then i noticed it was shimmering off the moonlight like an odd type of metallic material. while tapping my friend's arm, trying to get her attention, the disc horizontally starting moving towards the north. right about then i got my friend's attention and we both saw the same object take off as in hyperspeed to the north. we both agree the object was about 5 miles from us at an altitude of 5,000'. given this was my first ufo sighting i felt excitement and goosebumps.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Placitas
There were no other sightings in Placitas on or around June 22nd 2010
